subject: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Australian driver Mark Webber has spoken out against Formula One’s controversial decision to race in Bahrain this season and said he did not expect the rescheduled race to happen.
snippet: The Australian driver Mark Webber has spoken out against Formula One’s controversial decision to race in Bahrain this season and said he did not expect the rescheduled race to happen.
